plot: The life and work of the astronomer Nicolas Copernicus are shown by means of images of his writings and drawings and places he was associated with.
title: Copernicus
plot_es: The life and work of the astronomer Nicolas Copernicus are shown by means of images of his writings and drawings and places he was associated with.
plot_en: The life and work of the astronomer Nicolas Copernicus are shown by means of images of his writings and drawings and places he was associated with.
